resources.string: Provide permissions manually
Too many times failed the liveness check
Oops! Something went wrong.
Session expired!
Too many attempts!
Back
Uploading document\'s front photo…
Uploading document\'s back photo…
Uploading document\'s face photo…
Checking liveness…
Uploading passport cover photo…
Uploading proof of address photo…
Uploading second proof of address photo…
Proceed
INFORMATION
Because you chose a document other than an id card or passport, we are required to review your case one more time.
Continue
OH NO!
Could not determine document type. Please select document type in the next step.
Are you sure you want to abort verification?
Abort verification
YES
NO
Are you sure you want start over?
Start over
YES
NO
Analysing…
Please wait a moment.
Proceed
INFORMATION
Liveness check failed, please try again.
Face liveness check time is up. Please try again.
Show your passport
Make sure you show your passport during verification and not another document.
Passport has MRZ area
Make sure your document has the MRZ (2 or 3 character lines). If your document does not have an MRZ zone, select \"OTHER DOCUMENTS\" in the document selection window.
The passport fits in white frames
Make sure the passport fits into white frames and does not go beyond the borders of the frame, and the document shown is not blurred and clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover your face or any other information in the document.
There is no reflection of light
Make sure the light reflection or document hologram does not cover the face or other important document information.
Show your ID card
Make sure you show the ID card at the time of verification, not the other document.
The ID card front fits in white frames
Make sure the front of the ID card fits into the white frame and does not go beyond the edges of the frame, and the document shown is not blurred and clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover your face or any other information in the document.
There is no reflection of light
Make sure the light reflection or document hologram does not cover the face or other important document information.
Show your ID card back
Make sure you are showing the back of the ID card.
The document has the MRZ area
Make sure your document has the MRZ (2 or 3 character lines). If your document does not have an MRZ zone, select \"OTHER DOCUMENTS\" in the document selection window.
The back of the ID card fits in white frames
Make sure the back of the ID card fits into the white frame and does not go beyond the edges of the frame. Also, make sure the document you are displaying is not blurred and clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover the information in the document with your finger.
Show your Residence permit
Make sure you show the Residence permit at the time of verification, not the other document.
The Residence permit front fits in white frames
Make sure the front of the Residence permit fits into the white frame and does not go beyond the edges of the frame, and the document shown is not blurred and clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover your face or any other information in the document.
There is no reflection of light
Make sure the light reflection or document hologram does not cover the face or other important document information.
Show the back of your Residence permit
Make sure you are showing the back of the Residence permit.
The document has the MRZ area
Make sure your document has the MRZ (2 or 3 character lines). If your document does not have an MRZ zone, select \"OTHER DOCUMENTS\" in the document selection window.
The back of the Residence permit fits in white frames
Make sure the back of the Residence permit fits into the white frame and does not go beyond the edges of the frame. Also, make sure the document you are displaying is not blurred and clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover the information in the document with your finger.
Show your Driving license
Make sure you show the Driver license at the time of verification, not the other document.
The Driving license front fits in white frames
Make sure the front of the Driving license fits into the white frame and does not go beyond the edges of the frame, and the document shown is not blurred and clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover your face or any other information in the document.
There is no reflection of light
Make sure the light reflection or document hologram does not cover the face or other important document information.
Show your document that does not have MRZ
Make sure you show the document that does not have MRZ.
The front of the document fits in white frames
Make sure the front of the document fits into the white frame and does not go beyond the edges of the frame, and the document shown is not blurred and is clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover your face or any other information in the document.
There is no reflection of light
Make sure the light reflection or document hologram does not cover the face or other important document information.
The back of the document fits in white frames
Make sure the back of the document fits into the white frame and does not go beyond the edges of the frame, and the document shown is not blurred and is clearly legible.
The finger does not cover the document
Do not cover the information in the document with your finger.
Face fits in white frames
Make sure your face fits into white frames.
Only one face is visible
Make sure, there is no other faces visible in the picture.
The face is not covered by a shadow
Make sure your face is well lit and there is no shadow on it.
Face fits in the frame
Make sure your face fits into the frame. After taking the selfie move your face closer.
